thread.title: Samsung Electronics flags 4.2% drop in Q2 profit
thread.title_full: Samsung Electronics flags 4.2% drop in Q2 profit

title: Samsung Electronics flags 4.2% drop in Q2 profit
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 7, 2015, 01:14 BST - UK Markets open in 6 hrs 46 mins Samsung Electronics flags 4.2% drop in Q2 profit AFP – 18 minutes ago View Photo 

Samsung Electronics on Tuesday flagged a second quarter drop in operating profit that missed analyst estimates after sales of its newest flagship smartphone failed to meet expectations. 
In an earnings estimate, the giant South Korean smartphone and memory-chip maker predicted operating profit of around 6.9 trillion won ($6.1 billion) for the April-June period, down 4.2 percent from a year earlier.
